General.Name: Haemato AG
General.Description: HAEMATO AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the pharmaceutical sector in Germany. The company engages in the development, acquisition, licensing, and distribution of prescription drugs and OTC products, special cosmetics, as well as dietary supplements. It provides pharmaceuticals in the areas of HIV/AIDS, neurology, oncology, rheumatology, and ophthalmology diseases. The company also develops, manufactures, and distributes diagnostic tests under the HAEMATO brand, and cosmetics under the brand M1 SELECT, as well as supplies third party-products. It serves pharmacies, wholesalers, and clinics. HAEMATO AG was founded in 1993 and is based in Schönefeld, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Attila  Strauss
1.Title: Managing Director & Member of Management Board
